trans-unit.source: Resources are user-managed entities such as a database server, database or website in Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: Resources are user-managed entities such as a database server, database or website in Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: The following information is common to all tasks that you might do related to resources:
trans-unit.target: The following information is common to all tasks that you might do related to resources:

trans-unit.source: Replace {subscription-id} with your subscription identifier in the URI.
trans-unit.target: Replace {subscription-id} with your subscription identifier in the URI.

trans-unit.source: $skiptoken is optional and is only used if a partial result is returned in a previous operation call.
trans-unit.target: $skiptoken is optional and is only used if a partial result is returned in a previous operation call.

trans-unit.source: If the response contains a <parameterReference>nextLink</parameterReference> element, the value of the <parameterReference>nextLink</parameterReference> element includes a $skiptoken parameter with a value that specifies the starting point in the collection of entities for the next GET operation.
trans-unit.target: If the response contains a <parameterReference>nextLink</parameterReference> element, the value of the <parameterReference>nextLink</parameterReference> element includes a $skiptoken parameter with a value that specifies the starting point in the collection of entities for the next GET operation.

trans-unit.source: The $skiptoken parameter must only be used on the URI contained in the value of the <parameterReference>nextLink</parameterReference> element.
trans-unit.target: The $skiptoken parameter must only be used on the URI contained in the value of the <parameterReference>nextLink</parameterReference> element.

trans-unit.source: $filter is optional and is used to filter results.
trans-unit.target: $filter is optional and is used to filter results.

trans-unit.source: Replace {filter} with one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: Replace {filter} with one of the following values:

trans-unit.source: Currently, you cannot use the <languageKeyword>tagname</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>tagvalue</languageKeyword> filters with other filters; such as, <languageKeyword>name</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>location</languageKeyword>, or <languageKeyword>resourceType</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: Currently, you cannot use the <languageKeyword>tagname</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>tagvalue</languageKeyword> filters with other filters; such as, <languageKeyword>name</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>location</languageKeyword>, or <languageKeyword>resourceType</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: $top is optional and is used to limit the number of items that are returned in a response.
trans-unit.target: $top is optional and is used to limit the number of items that are returned in a response.

trans-unit.source: Replace {top} with the number items that you want returned.
trans-unit.target: Replace {top} with the number items that you want returned.

trans-unit.source: Set the <parameterReference>Authorization</parameterReference> header to a JSON Web Token that you obtain from Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Set the <parameterReference>Authorization</parameterReference> header to a JSON Web Token that you obtain from Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: You can do the following with resources:
trans-unit.target: You can do the following with resources:
